QuestData.Title: Blood Infusion
QuestData.Description: Your weapon is ready to be endowed with the power of blood.$b$bYou must face Queen Lana'thel in battle and subject yourself to her Blood Mirror. This will cause Shadow's Edge to drink the blood of the nearest living being. That being would be you, $r.$b$bOnce the blade has been thus awakened, allow the Queen's Frenzied Bloodthirst to take hold of you, feed the blade thrice to sate it, and then give the queen an ignominious death.$b$bMay her screams pierce the ears of the Lich King as he awaits his fate.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Infuse Shadow's Edge with Blood then defeat Lana'thel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Highlord Darion Mograine wants you to infuse Shadow's Edge with blood and defeat Queen Lana'thel.$B$BThis quest may only be completed in 25 person difficulty of Icecrown Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c.$b$bShadowmourne is nearly within reach.
